query: Python 3.13 - Features, Release Date, Changes, Performance Improvements
steps: Step 1: Research and document the official Python 3.13 release date, including any beta/RC release dates from the Python.org official website and PEP 719
Step 2: Compile a comprehensive list of new features in Python 3.13 such as PEP implementations, syntax improvements, and standard library enhancements from official Python documentation
Step 3: Identify and analyze all breaking changes and deprecations in Python 3.13 compared to Python 3.12, including removed features and modified behaviors
Step 4: Evaluate and document performance improvements in Python 3.13, including benchmarks for execution speed, memory usage, and startup time improvements
Step 5: Create a summary comparison table highlighting key differences between Python 3.13 and previous versions, organized by category (features, performance, compatibility)
